mapper.insert: insert into planner (plan_no, user_id, plan_title, plan_start, plan_end, plan_member, plan_hashtag) values (#{no}, #{userId}, #{title}, to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{member}, #{hashTag})
mapper.select: select (to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') - to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) from planner where plan_no = ${no}
mapper.insert: insert into planner_daily (plan_no, daily_key, daily_index, daily_date) values (#{planNo}, daily_seq.nextval, #{index}, #{date})
mapper.select: select plan_no as no , user_id as userId , plan_title as title , to_char(plan_start, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate , to_char(plan_end, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate , plan_member as member , create_date as createDate , plan_status as status , plan_open as open , plan_hashtag as hashTag from planner where plan_no = #{value}
select location_id, location_code, location_city, location_name, line_x, line_y, location_weather from locations where location_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into planner_location (plan_no, start_date, end_date, location_id) values (#{planNo}, to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{locationId})
mapper.select: select plan_no as planNo , to_char(start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate , to_char(end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate , create_date as createDate , location_id as locationId from planner_location where plan_no = #{value} order by create_date
mapper.update: update planner set plan_status = 'Y' where plan_no = #{value}
update planner_user set user_peanuts = (user_peanuts - ${peanuts}) where user_id = #{id}
update planner set plan_open = 'N' where plan_no = #{value}
